author: Special Correspondent
text:
Managements of companies and organisations need to be pro-active and enable their organisations to face new challenges, said S. Madhavan, CEO of Cognizant Foundation, here recently.

Speaking at the annual management day programme of Coimbatore Management Association, Mr. Madhavan said there were several changes in the world of management and even the predictions of experts on trends and markets for products have gone haywire.

Programmes

O.A. Balasubramaniam, president of the association, said it is organising several programmes for entrepreneurs, professional managers, and students of management.

Awards

Awards were presented to best entrepreneur (Rajesh B. Lund of Srivari Infrastructure), SME entrepreneur (P.S. Senthil Kumar, Managing Director of Pressana Group of Companies), woman entrepreneur (G. Miruthubashini of Womens Centre), start-up (R. Vignes Rengasamy of Helpr), manager (S.A. Gopalakrishnan, Group CFO of Pricol Corporate Services), and management faculty (G. Suresh, associate professor of EBET Group of Institutions, Tirupur). Prizes were given to management students who had won prizes in different contests.
title: Managements urged to be pro-active
